description: This file declares interfaces and functions related to CCSP TR-069 Protocol Agent (PA) configuration, including certificate handling, configuration initialization, and session parameters. It serves as a header file for defining the CCSP CWMP configuration interface in a C-based project.

methods.name: CcspTr069PaSsp_SetOpensslCertificateLocation
methods.description: Sets the location of OpenSSL certificates, optionally returning CA, device, and private key paths.

methods.name: CcspTr069PaSsp_InitCcspCwmpCfgIf
methods.description: Initializes the CCSP CWMP configuration interface.

methods.name: CcspTr069PaSsp_CcspCwmpCfgNoRPCMethods
methods.description: Returns the number of RPC methods supported.

methods.name: CcspTr069PaSsp_CcspCwmpCfgGetDevDataModelVersion
methods.description: Retrieves the device data model version (major and minor).

methods.name: CcspTr069PaSsp_GetHttpSessionIdleTimeout
methods.description: Gets the HTTP session idle timeout value.

methods.name: CcspTr069PaSsp_GetCwmpRpcTimeout
methods.description: Gets the CWMP RPC timeout value.

methods.name: CcspTr069PaSsp_GetTr069CertificateLocationForSyndication
methods.description: Gets the TR-069 certificate location for syndication purposes.

methods.name: CcspTr069PaSsp_JSON_GetItemByName
methods.description: Retrieves a JSON item by partner ID and item name.

methods.name: CcspTr069PaSsp_LoadCfgFile
methods.description: Loads the configuration file given its filename.
